title: CreateWarpedGridImage
description: Create a warped grid image based on the specified deformation field.

image_dimension.title: Image Dimension
image_dimension.description: The dimensionality of the input image.

deformation_field.title: Deformation Field
deformation_field.description: File containing the deformation field to be applied.

output_image.title: Output Image
output_image.description: The filename of the output warped grid image.

directions.title: Directions
directions.description: Directions for the grid warping, e.g., '1x0x0'.

grid_sigma.title: Grid Sigma
grid_sigma.description: Sigma value for the grid smoothing, e.g., '1x1x1'.
